author: dildick
body:
#### PR description:

Revert #29562 - which has unintended consequences at PU200 -  for the HLT TDR. I also fixed a bug in the CSC upgrade anode LCT processor. 

#### PR validation:

Tested in CMSSW_11_1_2_patch2 + #30914 on `/RelValSingleMuFlatPt2To100/CMSSW_11_0_0-PU25ns_110X_mcRun4_realistic_v3_2026D49PU200-v1/GEN-SIM-DIGI-RAW`

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Needs to be backported to 11_1_X (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31027) for the HLT TDR.

attn: @rekovic @tahuang1991
title: Revert #29562 and use low-quality ALCTs only in ME2/1
